column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Guard says : " Your majesty , these juveniles were arrested for vandalism , traveling under false pretenses , and malicious destruction of cabbages . "
#Text=Cabbage merchant says : " Off with their heads !
#Text=Only the king can pass down judgment .
#Text=What is your judgment , sire ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Throw them ... a feast !
#Text=" Bumi says : " The people in my city have gotten fat from too many feasts , so I hope you like your chicken with no skin .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks , but I do n't eat meat .
#Text=" Bumi says : " How about you ?
#Text=I bet you like meat .
#Text=" Katara says : " Is it just me , or is this guy 's crown a little crooked ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " So tell me , young bald one , where are you from ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm from ... Kangaroo Island !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh , Kangaroo Island , eh ?
#Text=I hear that place is really hopping !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=It was pretty funny .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , all these good jokes are making me tired .
#Text=Guess it 's time to hit the hay .
#Text=" Bumi says : " There 's an airbender in our presence , and not just any airbender .
#Text=The Avatar !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Now , what do you have to say for yourself , Mr. Pippinpaddleopsicopolis ?
#Text="
